memory
Class ActionMemory

java.lang.Object
  memory.ActionMemory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAction, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class ActionMemory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAction

Following Zwick and Patterson analysis, there are only three different useful actions :

  • Flip two already known cards.
  • Flip first an unknown card, then a known one.
  • Flip two unknown cards.
In the last two cases, if, after the first flip, we can match this card with a already known one, both cards are taken out, and the player plays again.

Author:
Francesco De Comite
See Also:
